creator: dshort@san.rr.com
text:
In Navigator 4.75, and 4.79 HTML pages are turncated at 8192 bytes.  There are 
no messages displayed, the page just stops loading at 8192 bytes.

I have two test cases that I can forward.  One works and one doesn't work.

creator: dshort@san.rr.com
text:
Created attachment 2679
Navigator 8192 byte truncation test cases

I tried your testcase with Netscape 4.75 and I do not see the failure on either 
NT, 2000 or XP. Some cgi fixes went into 2.0.40, please upgrade to the latest 
level of Apache to see if the problem has already been fixed.
creator: ake@apache.org
